apiVersion.description:
Specifies the version of the custom resource definition (CRD) from the deploy.ibm.com API group. 
 Example: 'apiVersion: wazideploy.ibm.com/v1'

kind.description:
Indicates the type of custom resource being defined. 
 Example: 'kind: ManifestState'

metadata.description: The metadata of the application manifest that was generated by the Wazi Deploy packager.

name.description: The name of the application to be deployed. Example: 'name: GenAppCICS'

version.description: The optional description of the application to be deployed.

description.description: The version of the application to be deployed.

annotations.description:
Any valid YAML contents. The annotations parameter typically contains the following fields: 
 1. The creationTimestamp of the manifest. 
 2. The package level with the name and location of the application package in the source control management system.

artifacts.description: Information on each artifact in the application package file. 'items' key holds the 'properties' key.

description.description: Name of the artifact, followed by its type (for example LGUCDB01.CICSLOAD).

hash.description: When the manifest is produced by The Wazi Deploy packager command, the hash is the sha256 value of the source file.

type.description: The artifact type that is indicated in the deployment method.

properties.description: The key and associated value that are listed for each artifact. In a static deployment, the key is the path to the artifact in the package file.

deleted_artifacts.description: The artifacts that are to be deleted. 'items' key holds the 'properties' key.

hash.description: When the manifest is produced by The Wazi Deploy packager command, the hash is the sha256 value of the source file.

type.description: The artifact type that is indicated in the deployment method.
